description: Dota 2 mod manager for hero cosmetics, HUD, weather, and terrain with auto-patching
rules: Use Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection for all service resolution
All async methods must accept CancellationToken as last parameter
Return OperationResult for fallible operations instead of throwing
Use IAppLogger for all logging, never Console.WriteLine
Read extraction logs via HeroExtractionLog.Load() and MiscExtractionLog.Load()
